import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../assets/logo.svg"; import WalletBalance from "./WalletBalance"; import ReferAd from "./ReferAd"; import SidebarMenu from "./SidebarMenu"; export default function Header() { const [navbarOpen, setnavbarOpen] = useState(false); const location = useLocation(); return ( <>
); }
